channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Fear and panic at Florida State as deadly shooting sends students fleeing
item.description: When a 20-year-old opened fire at Florida State University, terrified students barricaded doors and fled across campus, abandoning chemistry notes and even shoes.

item.title: The US has a single rare earths mine. Chinese export limits are energizing a push for more
